#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int a[15]={
		1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,10000
	};
	int n,i,sum,f;
	sum=0;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	//printf("%d\n",n);
	while(n!=0)
	{f=0;
	for(i=0;i<15 && f==0;i++)
	{
		if(n<a[i])
		{
			n=n%a[i-1];
			//	printf("%d ",n);
			sum++;
			f=1;
	//		printf("%d ",sum);
		}
	}	
	}
	printf("%d",sum);
	
}
